text: Michael Ryan Flatley (born July 16, 1958) is an Irish-American dancer. He became known for Irish dance shows Riverdance, Lord of the Dance, Feet of Flames, and Celtic Tiger Live. In 2003, Flatley was treated for a malignant melanoma. In January 2023, Flatley announced that he had surgery for "an aggressive form of cancer". ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Irish entertainers Category:American dancers Category:Entertainers from Chicago
title: Michael Flatley
